title: Walker secures approval at South East Wilton
text:
Developer Lang Walker's Walker Corporation has secured Stage One approval for its large housing project in South East Wilton in Sydney's south-west, following a long wait that involved court action, negotiations with council and resistance from local residents.

Lang Walker. Arsineh Houspian

The approval will pave the way for the first 696 housing lots in a new housing corridor 80 kilometres from Sydney and close to the city's planned second airport at Badgerys Creek.

The Sydney Western City Planning Panel approved Walker Corporation’s development application for the first of six stages of the precinct on Tuesday,

The company welcomed the approval, saying it would allow housing, jobs and infrastructure to flourish.

"Walker appreciates that Wilton is a great place to live for families and we know the local environment is a big part of what makes the area so special," Walker Corporation's Oliver Roborgh said.
description: Developer Lang Walker's Walker Corporation has secured Stage One approval for its large housing project in South East Wilton in Sydney's south-west.
